articles.title: Elon Musk's "Ancient" Business Card Finds Its Way To Internet. He Reacts - NDTV
articles.description: A picture of Elon Musk's business card from 1995 has everyone's attention. The card, in question, is from when Mr Musk started the company Zip 2.
articles.content:
Elon Musk's throwback business card has become an instant hit on Twitter. (FILE)
